Description:
889sqm in the Heart of Highton!
This very rare opportunity is yours for the taking. This large 889sqm (Approx.) block is positioned in a highly sought after and tightly held pocket of Highton. Positioned within a stones throw to the Highton Village, barwon river, Barrabool Hills Plaza and some of the best schools Geelong has to offer. Whether you wish to build your dream home or develop (STCA), the opportunities here are truly endless. Often sought and rarely found. This is the block you have been waiting for! Owners keen to meet market on the day. Enquire today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Impressive Proportions. Impeccable Presentation
PLEASE CONTACT NIKOLETT PESTI FOR A PRIVATE VIEWING
Delivering the absolute epitome of success in the exclusive Bellrise Park Estate,this amazing family home is certain to impress. Beautifully presented throughout, this is a home where your family will be happy for many years to come.
In an obvious commitment to quality and attention to detail, light filled stylish and sophisticated interior spaces feature premium fittings, fixture and finishes throughout a brilliant and clever array of living, accommodation and entertainment options.
Upon entry you have a definite feeling of space with widened hallway & raised ceilings. Accommodation for the property comprises of a large master bedroom with walk in robe and dual vanity ensuite complete with oversized shower.
The living space of this home is extraordinary both in size and layout, consisting of a huge central family room showcasing a superb fish tank which you could admire for hours, and a separate rumpus/theatre room creates the ultimate zone for the largest of families.
The central hub of the home is not only a perfect combination of space and exquisite style, it is one of the warmest and most appealing spaces you could imagine, an extremely generous kitchen with central breakfast bar, pot draws, dishwasher, 900mm oven, stone bench tops along with a walk in pantry.
Towards the rear of the home you enter into the third living area, currently set up as the kids rumpus. You will also find three further bedrooms all with built in robes and complemented by the family bathroom which feature a separate shower and bathtub.
Taking the property to another level is the outdoor living and entertaining in the very best way possible, an enormous mix of lounge and dining space with outdoor blinds right around providing the ultimate in style and enjoyment.
Offering everything a large family could need all on a brilliant 832sqm allotment, the home offers a double remote garage with internal access plus the side space for trailer parking.
Extras include- gas ducted heating, solar hot water, downlights, large timber deck, garden sheds, well maintained front yard and backyard, quality blinds, carpets, light fittings and much more.
The location enjoys a gentle stroll to the open parkland, Estuary Sporting Reserve- a full size football oval and soccer pitch is only 600m away. Easy access to the expanded Gateway Shopping Plaza which features cafes, eateries, big brand stores and medical facility. The local Primary School & Kindergarten are also at easy reach. Geelong CBD and all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer are only a short fifteen-minute drive away making the property the blend of space and convenience.
Insights: 22-24 Spectacle Way, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Instant Income with Development Potential
This 873m2 (approx.) allotment with its income producing home (rental) will capture your attention. With a solid tenant in place, the home features 3 bedrooms + study, rumpus room, central bathroom and excellent off street parking. There are a myriad of possibilities here, with the potential to develop (stca) at the top of the list. Dont delay your inspection as this is a rare find in a popular location.
Available to view by private appointment only.

Description:
Neat as a Pin & Ready for Its Next Owner
On offer is a great example of modern day living, perfect for a first home buyer, young family, investor or downsizer. With a corner allotment of 502 M2 (Approx.) this 3 - bedroom 2 - bathroom home with open kitchen dining & living is perfect for most.
North facing master bedroom soaking up the beautiful morning sun includes walk in robe and ensuite. Bedroom two also being north facing includes a built in robe. As you walk through the house you enter the open plan kitchen dining and living that looks out to the L shaped backyard. Kitchen includes 4 burner gas cooktop electric fan-forced oven and dishwasher. Main bathroom and 3rd bedroom with built in robe, are accessed off the living.
You will be enjoying many days and nights outside on the large entertainment deck while still having plenty of yard for the family and pets to run around. Having double street frontage, you not only have a double car garage with rear and internal access but also double gates into the backyard perfect to store the boat, caravan or trailer.
Location is one of the main attractions of this lovely home being only a short walk to Marshall train station, 10 minutes to Barwon Heads & the Bellarine, 15 minutes to Torquay and you will be in Melbourne in just over an hour.
Insights: 46-48 Macfarlane Street, Marshall VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 28 other 3 bedroom house in Marshall have recently been sold.

Description:
THE PERFECT FAMILY HOME WITH GREAT PRIVACY!!
Immaculately presented this beautiful single storey family home is stylish in design and boasts ample accommodation with living zones for the entire family to enjoy and features a north facing alfresco to suit all season entertaining. Comprising 4 bedrooms including master with walk in robe and en-suite while built in robes are in the remaining bedrooms and a centrally located family bathroom. Open plan kitchen, dining and living with an uninterrupted flow to the fabulous outdoor, undercover entertaining area, the kitchen is highlighted by a large walk in pantry, stone bench tops and 900mm cooktop / Smeg oven. An ultra-spacious second living/rumpus room is the perfect space for the children to congregate while a third living zone situated at the front of the home could also be a versatile studio or home office ideal for those who wish to run a business from home. Completing the home and featuring a wood fire pizza oven, 2.7m ceilings, gas ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, plantation shutters, great storage / linen press, double lock up garage with internal access and situated on a very private allotment size of 610m2 (approx.), surrounded by immaculately landscaped gardens including a nectarine and peach tree. An easy walk to the Dunes Shopping Village, parks, reserves, child-care, schools and only moments from local beaches and Torquay town centre makes this the perfect family home or investment property, don't miss out on this sensational residence, call today to book your inspection.
Insights: 28 Centreside Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Old Barwon Heads Charm
The Feel:
Set within private, established gardens and located opposite the Village Parklands, this original 1950s Barwon Heads house offers 2 spacious bedrooms both with garden views, ceiling fans & robes (master with en suite). A study or third bedroom leads to a unique light filled sunroom/dining room opening to the lush back garden. Classic features of beautiful polished timber flooring and battened ceilings - meet refurbished elements including modern kitchen, open lounge/living room & impressive Japanese-inspired main bathroom. The north-facing lounge has a wood burning fire plus SSAC.
The Facts:
-Beautiful gardens surround classic, established home with unique characteristics
-Build oriented for best utilisation of entire block & outdoor areas
-Low maintenance abode that offers pure lifestyle for permanent or weekender
-Set on 650sqm (approx). with options to explore development (STCA)
-Sunny north-facing living room overlooks the front deck & gardens
-Nectre (SA built) wood burning fire with tiled hearth, & split system AC
-Modern functional kitchen includes electric cooking & Miele DW
-Unique design sunroom/dining room with double glazed windows, opens to lush gardens & soaring Silver Birches
-Two bedrooms with garden outlooks, BIRs & ceiling fans, master with en suite
-3rd bedroom or study with raised ceiling & high light windows
-Impressive Japanese-inspired main bathroom with onsen-style bath
-Polished concrete floors complement beautiful polished timber flooring
-Large, private, fully fenced yard with sliding front gate, timber boardwalk & new garden shed
-Front deck overlooks the garden & water feature, plus rear deck for entertaining
-Orange Jessamine hedged boundary & private lawn
-Sustainable, productive garden; loquat, blood orange, lime, apple, quince, apricot, peach, passionfruit, fig, grapes + raised vegie beds & herbs
-Green features: 8 solar panels 2.2kW, Sanden eco hot water service, 3,000ltr water tanks connected to drip irrigation system
-Covered single carport plus OSP for multiple vehicles
-Direct access to neighbouring Village Parklands & walking trails to river & beach
-Easy access to village amenities, transport & sporting facilities
The Owner Loves.
The gardens are a huge feature of this home. We proudly revegetated the entire block & delight in harvesting & bottling abundant seasonal produce. The sunroom is an incredible space to host dinner parties, & the Japanese-inspired bathroom is a beautiful piece of workmanship.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Address: 3/45 Wattle Bird Crescent Barwon Heads VIC 3227
Description:
Stunning Town Residence with Quality Inclusions
A considerable opportunity now presents itself to secure a quality built, three bedroom town residence, in this highly desired location, constructed by locally recognised, DA Builders. Hosting a highly functional layout over two comfortable levels and a long list of quality inclusions.
Wattle Bird is a tightly held Crescent, rarely offering property to the market due to its desirable, naturalistic environment. Favoured by local families, it remains tucked away at the prestigious river end of our Village, a stones throw from the Estuary and blissfully removed from Summer tourism.
Inclusions include:
Master & ensuite on ground floor
Stylish kitchen with Smeg appliances and walk in pantry
Stone benchtops with soft closing drawers and doors
Frameless shower screens to bathrooms
Tasmanian oak floorboards
Sawn cypress timber alfresco area complementing cypress vertical cladding
Cypress decking
Multiple Daikin/Fujitsu Inverter Split Systems
Solar hot water service
Separate ground floor powder room
Private north facing court yard
Fully landscaped with coastal appeal
Gas feature log fire
This is a unique opportunity, offering an idealistic lifestyle whether it be for permanent living or as an investment property. Inspection is a must.

Build your dream home with room to move, adjacent to rolling hills and farmland and only minutes drive to Torquay & Bells beach surf breaks. Fantastic schools within this well sought after region make it possible to work, live and enjoy the Bellbrae lifestyle.
Do not hesitate as hindsight is a wonderful thing but foresight is better.

Description:
A Solid Start with a Bright Future
A classic brick home with outstanding future potential, located in a coveted family neighbourhood with easy access to local schools, public transport & shops. This solid well planned home features 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, main with ensuite & WIR, generous comfortable lounge, spacious dining area & central kitchen. Outside is a double carport, garden shed, all on a large allotment of 682m2 approx. Close to walking and riding tracks along the Waurn Ponds Creek, a short drive to High Street and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, library, Leisure Link and the beaches of the Surf Coast or Melbourne via the ring road. Perfect first home, family home or rock solid investment in a proven growth suburb.

Description:
Belmont Buying At Its Best!
This neat as a pin brick home, located in the heart of Belmont is perfect for families, first home buyers or astute investors looking to add to their current portfolios. Featuring 3 large bedrooms all with BIRs, updated family bathroom, large laundry with second shower, light filled lounge and meals area and kitchen with attached dining space. The kitchen also looks out onto the undercover entertaining area & backyard of approx. 564sqm which faces North & is bathed in beautiful sunshine all year round. The home has had some fresh updates added such as new blinds throughout, fresh paint, new wet area flooring, the roof has been re pointed & re sprayed and a new front fence has been added but the opportunity is still there to add value should you choose to do so. Ducted heating, split system cooling, a 3.5kw solar system, and a DLUG complete this impressive package that is located only a short drive to the High Street Shops, Waurn Ponds shopping center, Deaking Uni & the Epworth Hospital. Approx rental of $370pw.

Description:
Accommodation plus entertainer's dream.
Perfect for the convenience seeking family searching for abundant accommodation all located in a quiet Grovedale pocket within close proximity to a range of services. Glorious light filled accommodation is the hallmark of this delightful residence where space and convenience counts allowing you to move in and enjoy from day one making it a lifestyle location for now and well into the future.
This stunning family home consists of four bedrooms, master with a renovated ensuite, central renovated bathroom located for ease of day to day living for the remaining three bedrooms. Open plan living, kitchen and dining area with a second living room leading you to the undercover outdoor entertaining area, perfect for year round use.
Features include split system, dishwasher, 900mm oven, gas wall heater, shed / workshop, single car garage and a single carport or second entertaining area. Positioned on approx. 727 sqm this block allows you plenty of off street parking for cars, caravans or trailers. Rounding out this sensational offering is the immaculately maintained gardens throughout.
Grovedale is commonly noted as one of the most conveniently located suburbs of Geelong complimented by the ever expanding Waurn Ponds Shopping Plaza, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre across the road, world class Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, multiple schools, state of the art sporting facilities and easily connecting to Melbourne via Waurn Ponds and Marshall train stations or the Ring Road (M1) taking you to the CBD in an hour. Walking distance to the Grovedale Central Shopping Centre and close proximity to bus stops. This is certainly a great opportunity not to be missed.

Easy to build on + $25k from Scomo to build!
With manageable building platforms and panoramic views, these two 960m2 blocks individually represent great value - but if the purse allows, what an incredible opportunity to build your dream home on almost half an acre!! Enjoy the benefits of a huge yard now, then sell it off when the kids stop using it and top up your super (or take an amazing holiday!).
Enjoy stunning sunsets over the Barrabool Hills and views towards the You Yangs,
Just 15mins to the CBD and moments to the ring road, you'll be on your way to Melbourne or the Surfcoast in no time (when we're allowed to again!).
Need a builder recommendation? Just ask, we know plenty!
Titled and ready for you to start building, call David today to secure one or both of these blocks.

Description:
Stylish, Contemporary & Family Friendly
The striking modern façade gives a mere hint of the quality and style on offer. Yet there is more on offer at this residence, made to create those unforgettable family moments that make a house a home. When you wake from slumber in the master suite which features a full en suite and large walk-in-robe you can enjoy the outlook over your prized backyard. While the heart of the home is modern with charm from the stylish stone island bench with pendant lights to the quality Smeg appliances (900 mm stove & dishwasher) with prep area and walk-in-pantry. Open to the dining area and family room that is set off by the expansive windows, solid timber floors and the wood heater, the perfect family room. From here you step outside to the alfresco that is hidden yet offers a view across the valley to Fyansford or step out the back to the swimming pool with outdoor shower and is meticulously landscaped. Other offerings include the large rumpus room with built-in-bar, the double bedrooms, Daikin ducted reverse cycle split system, solar panels & invertor system and an oversized garage with remote entry. All a short stroll down to the parkland by the Barwon River (including Buckley Falls), or walk to the Barrabool Hills Shopping Centre and with quality schools and access to the Ring Road only moments away, you have found your family's new home.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
This Won't Last Long!!
PLEASE CONTACT GEORGE POLITIS FOR A PRIVATE VIEWING
Situated in the ever-popular Estuary Estate this beautifully presented property has just turned five and ready for its next owner. Upon inspection, you will be impressed with the quality and extras this property offers. this abode makes an affordable starter, impeccable downsizer or lucrative investment opportunity.
Landscaped gardens welcome you to the home, whereupon stepping inside, modern interiors finished in a neutral palette are revealed. An inviting open plan family and meals area flow effortlessly to the gourmet kitchen. Designed to please the Masterchef within, the kitchen boasts stone benchtops, gas cooking and a walk-in pantry. Fire up the barbie and enjoy Friday night drinks while you watch the kids and pets roam around with beautiful views of Geelong.
The master suite is a private sanctuary serviced by a walk-in robe and a deluxe ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms share an elegant family bathroom complete with a shower, bath and a separate toilet. Two of the bedrooms feature built-in robes whilst the fourth bedroom can also be used as a rumpus.
Occupying an easy care 448m2 block, other premium features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling and double lock-up garage with internal access.
Estuary Estate is renowned for its sporting fields and clubs, beautiful reserves and walkways. Serviced by public transport, the home is also accessible to the Geelong CBD, Bellarine and local beaches. The home is also moments to local schools and shops with a Bunnings up the road and the Gateway Plaza shopping centre.
Near new, there's nothing left to do but move-in or rent out. Priced to meet the market, this one will sell fast. Call now to arrange an inspection today.
Rental potential $430-$450pw.

Description:
Rustic Design In Quiet Court Setting
The Feel:
Designed to embrace a Story Book, rustic design, this distinctive home in a quiet court is packed with function whilst maintaining a generosity of space. Soaring pitched ceilings encompass ground floor open plan living & kitchen, with timber floors, 2 bedrooms (main with en suite) & a 2nd bathroom. The mezzanine floor offers a study area & lounge, with a 3rd BR overlooking the in-ground pool & a separate party room with bar. North aspect gardens & covered decks spell relaxed coastal vibes, while a double carport & storage shed offer ample parking.
The Facts:
-Open plan living, kitchen, meals with north & east outlook to covered wraparound deck
-Light-filled soaring pitched ceiling with high light window
-Practical kitchen w/ breakfast island bench, timber cabinets, gas oven & cooktop & DW
-Ceiling fans to both living rooms + ducted heating throughout
-Staircase offers concealed storage & display space
-Versatile 2nd living space & study area upstairs on mezzanine floor, adjacent to 3rd bedroom
-Master with large WIR & en suite with shower, vanity & toilet
-Sunny 2nd bedroom with BIR
-Main bathroom with bath, vanity, shower & separate toilet
-Polished timber flooring
-Fully fenced yard with lovely front garden & lawn & glass balustrade to in-ground solar heated pool
-Double carport w/ room for vehicles, trailer or boat + lock up storage room
-Separate 9.5 x 5.5m party room/versatile space with French doors, bar, lounge area & TV point
-Just minutes to school, shops, river & beach via Village Parklands
Owner Loves....
Theres nothing better than summertime fun in the pool, & having friends over to enjoy the party room & bar. There are so many places to sit & relax, from your morning coffee on the front porch, to late afternoon drinks in the north west-facing backyard.

Description:
A Belmont Gem Upon Approx. 702m2!
Occupying a corner block, this property presents a terrific opportunity upon approx. 702m2! Whether you want to move straight in, extend to create your dream family abode, or use the expansive land size for development, this is the one for you (STCA)!
Set within walking distance to schools and the vibrant High Street shopping precinct, this location is simply superb. High Street is home to a variety of cafés, shops and big-brand stores, leaving you spoilt for choice. Families will love that they never have to worry about school traffic again with Roslyn P.S, Oberon P.S, Belmont High School and Barwon Valley School all a short stroll away. Public transport is within close reach, while easy access to Highton Village and the Barwon River is another plus.
The endearing weatherboard home is graced with a west-facing verandah, where you can soak up the sunshine and admire the surrounding gardens. Inside, the interiors exude old world charm with timber paneling and decorative plasterwork. The generous living room flows through to the dining area, while the kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). Two bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the laundry and separate toilet complete the layout. A gas wall heater and air conditioner provide comfort.
The sheltered alfresco creates the perfect setting for casual outdoor living, while flowing onto the expansive backyard. Home to established trees, the backyard provides buyers with a world of opportunities.
Youll need to act swiftly to secure such an expansive land size in a prized pocket of Belmont!
Terms: 10% deposit, settlement 90 days.

Description:
Ready to unlock big value.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Perfect for the savvy first home buyer seeking an affordable entry in to the Leopold market place or the astute investor seeking big returns. Situated on a corner allotment of approx. 586m2 the options are endless including renovation/extension or subdivision (STCA).
Consisting of three bedrooms all with BIR's, central bathroom, open plan living, kitchen and dining area leading you to the outdoor entertaining area. Features include gas heater, dishwasher, instant gas hot water and double car garage with workshop.
Within close proximity to the ever expanding Leopold Gateway Plaza, public transport, quality schools, parks and walking tracks. Also close to the Geelong CBD & stunning Waterfront, ensuring a very convenient lifestyle.
Insights: 31 William Street, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
FANTASTIC BUYING IN THE HEART OF WOMBAH PARK
Impressive in size this quality built Dennehy single level family home offers the ultimate in low maintenance living and situated in the heart of Wombah Park. Presenting a perfect opportunity for the first home buyer, retirees or those looking to secure an excellent investment property.
Freshly painted throughout and comprising 3 bedrooms inclusive of built in robes, two-way spacious bathroom, laundry, light filled open plan kitchen / meals and generous sized living area with a northerly aspect and outlook to a private undercover courtyard, front yard and garden. Featuring reverse cycle air conditioning, ceiling fan, 2 x sheds and a huge rear yard for the kids to play on a great sized 650m2 (approx.) allotment.
When it comes to buying a weekender, first home, investment property or downsizer, it doesnt come much better than this!! Priced to sell in a great location and only just a short walk to the whites beach, the flying fox park, Deep Creek Reserve, Tennis Courts and Loch Ard Drive convenience store.
Insights: 12 Scammell Crescent, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.
